medical_history.chief_complaint: Vague abdominal pain persisting and progressing over the past week.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed some vague abdominal pain that has persisted and progressed over the past week. Described as sharp pain. Tolerated PO intake throughout the week with minimal nausea and vomiting. Denied previous history of painless jaundice or symptoms consistent with biliary colic.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hypothyroidism, hypercholesterolemia; previous surgeries include posterior neck hemangioma resection and anterior cervical discectomy.
